basic.blooming: Flowering period February-August, fruiting period November
basic.color: Flower color red, to white, fruit color black

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes warm, moist and sunny environments, grows better near the water sources
maintenance.watering: Need a lot of water during spring, summer, and autumn to keep soil moist, may spray water on the plant to keep moist when air is dry
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
